book.synopsis: Going undercover as a new Gamma Eta Pi sorority pledge to expose the truth surrounding the disappearance of Merilynn Morris and the supposed suicide of Eve Camlan, Samantha Penrose finds more than she bargained for when she is plunged into a sinister realm of witchcraft and the supernatural. Original.
